scenario_text.value: Whaddaya want from me...? Shit!!!
Kaito...
Who asked you to be here? Back off.
I ain’t gonna do that.
I said BACK OFF!

Or what? You’ll direct your abusive language
at him, too? Have I got that right?
What the... Haru?!

...Still alive, huh? Where the heck have you
been?

That doesn’t matter. What matters is you,
Kaito.
Don’t you want to get revenge on the Master?
What?!
Haru? The heck are you...?

You hate the Master, don’t you? He stole your
precious sister from you, didn’t he?

Then come with me. I’ll teach you a way to
get what you want.

Revenge...me? Yeah...that’s right, the Master
took Miu from me...
Kaito! No, you can’t go, Kaito!
...Dammit!
Huh? I see someone leaving... Is that Kaito?
No, not just Kaito. Dracumon and...Haru?!
Wait, Aoi! You can’t go off on your own!
Labramon?! But look, Haru’s alive!

Something’s off. Dracumon’s freaking out, and
Haru’s looking kinda suspicious.

I don’t like this. If we’re gonna go after
them, we should get the others.

You’re right. We’d better keep cool. Let’s
tell everyone!
